name: Animal Joy
question: [Set 1] 1. Given the choice of anyone in the world, whom would you want as a dinner guest?

name: Food comfort
question: [Set 1] 2. Would you like to be famous? In what way?What foods have brought you comfort lately?

name: Plant Joy
question: [Set 1] 3. Before making a telephone call, do you ever rehearse what you are going to say? Why?

name: Non-human Living Joy
question: [Set 1]4. What would constitute a “perfect” day for you?

name: Name origin
question: [Set 1] 5. When did you last sing to yourself? To someone else?

name: Inspiring teacher
question: [Set 1] 6. If you were able to live to the age of 90 and retain either the mind or body of a 30-year-old for the last 60 years of your life, which would you want?

name: Secret talent
question: [Set 1] 7. Do you have a secret hunch about how you will die?

name: Tradition
question: [Set 1] 8. Name three things you and your partner appear to have in common.

name: Breakfast food
question: [Set 1] 9. For what in your life do you feel most grateful?

name: Moving out
question: [Set 1] 10. If you could change anything about the way you were raised, what would it be?

name: Unlimited supply
question: 11. Take four minutes and tell your partner your life story in as much detail as possible.

name: Cartoon hangout
question: [Set 1] 12. If you could wake up tomorrow having gained any one quality or ability, what would it be?

name: Movie refresh
question: [Set 2] 13. If a crystal ball could tell you the truth about yourself, your life, the future or anything else, what would you want to know?

name: Statue
question: [Set 2] 14. Is there something that you’ve dreamed of doing for a long time? Why haven’t you done it?

name: Inspiring teacher
question: [Set 2] 15. What is the greatest accomplishment of your life?

name: Fast fashion
question: [Set 2] 16. What do you value most in a friendship?

name: Bad hair day
question: [Set 2] 17. What is your most treasured memory?

name: Good stuff
question: [Set 2] 18. What is your most terrible memory?

name: Time of day
question: [Set 2] 19. If you knew that in one year you would die suddenly, would you change anything about the way you are now living? Why?

name: Podcast
question: [Set 2] 20. What does friendship mean to you?

name: Teaching
question: [Set 2] 21. What roles do love and affection play in your life?

name: Childhood shoes
question: [Set 2] 22. Alternate sharing something you consider a positive characteristic of your partner. Share a total of five items.

name: Family describes
question: [Set 2] 23. How close and warm is your family? Do you feel your childhood was happier than most other people’s?

name: Parent lessons
question: [Set 2] 24. How do you feel about your relationship with your mother?

name: Fav performance
question: [Set 3] 25. Make three true “we” statements each. For instance, “We are both in this room feeling ... “

name: Animal Battle
question: [Set 3] 26. Complete this sentence: “I wish I had someone with whom I could share ...

name: Fast fashion
question: [Set 3] 27. If you were going to become a close friend with your partner, please share what would be important for him or her to know.

name: Bad hair day
question: [Set 3] 28. Tell your partner what you like about them; be very honest this time, saying things that you might not say to someone you’ve just met.

name: Good stuff
question: [Set 3] 29. Share with your partner an embarrassing moment in your life.What's something that is going well for you right now?

name: Time of day
question: [Set 3] 30. When did you last cry in front of another person? By yourself?

name: Podcast
question: [Set 3] 31. Tell your partner something that you like about them already.What is your favorite time of day?

name: Teaching
question: [Set 3] 32. What, if anything, is too serious to be joked about?

name: Childhood shoes
question: [Set 3] 33. If you were to die this evening with no opportunity to communicate with anyone, what would you most regret not having told someone? Why haven’t you told them yet?

name: Family describes
question: [Set 3] 34. Your house, containing everything you own, catches fire. After saving your loved ones and pets, you have time to safely make a final dash to save any one item. What would it be? Why?

name: Parent lessons
question: [Set 3] 35. Of all the people in your family, whose death would you find most disturbing? Why?

name: Fav performance
question: [Set 3] 36. Share a personal problem and ask your partner’s advice on how he or she might handle it. Also, ask your partner to reflect back to you how you seem to be feeling about the problem you have chosen.
